apple_vendor_description: The kiss between two women emoji, as seen on Apple devices, radiates warmth and intimacy with its carefully crafted 3D design. One figure, rendered with a medium-light skin tone, leans in towards the other, who sports a medium-dark skin tone, their faces positioned for a tender kiss, highlighted by soft, realistic lighting that enhances the glossy sheen of their features. Appleâ€™s signature smooth gradients and softly rounded edges contribute to an overall feeling of gentle affection and romantic expression, perfect for conveying love and connection between two women.
